title: 5E-Flipped E-Learning-Based Program for Enhancing English Speaking Skills in Science Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and intermediate expertise in scientific fields
context.additional_context: Emphasizes English presentation and discussion skills in scientific fields for professionals to immediately apply in workplace settings

learning_goals: Learners can confidently deliver a 5-minute English presentation on a science topic through the 5E-flipped learning model.
Learners can complete a video project explaining science experiment results in English through collaboration with peers.
Learners can improve speaking skills by 20% or more based on peer review feedback at least twice weekly in a flipped classroom environment.

resources: Science Field English Speaking Template Library
Weekly Microlearning Content (10 x 5-7 Minute Videos)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
